translations: v.挖沟；[航]水上迫降（ditch 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Come on, folks: get on board with ditching the outdated tip system.
sentences.translation: 来吧，伙计们：我们一起抛弃过时的小费制度吧。

sentences.sentence: So come on, folks: get on board with ditching the outdated tip system.
sentences.translation: 所以，伙计们，来吧：加入行列，抛弃过时的小费制度吧。

sentences.sentence: Come up with a plan for ditching your debt.
sentences.translation: 制定一个还请债务的计划。
